property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target. −X: Exile each permanent with mana value X or less that's one or more colors. −1[0]: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an enchantment. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To survive, you must seize every opportunity." - Daghatar the Adamant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has vigilance as long as you control a black or green permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Abzan Skycaptain dies, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A tempest is coming. Turn your faces toward the wind!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Arashin Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll have time to put out the fires when those trapped within the ruins are safe."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not hide from the dragons that pretend to rule the skies. If we did, the dragons would become our rulers, and our way of life would be lost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage is prevented this way, you may have Channel Harm deal that much damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. • Dragons - At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Daghatar the Adamant enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{BG}{BG}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto a second target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our victories will protect a thousand generations."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has spent years training his eyes and ears to detect the subtle signs of a dragon's approach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, bolster X, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put X +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dragons seek war. I bring it to them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfectly suited for life in the Shifting Wastes, the krushok is well protected by its horn, its hide, and its temper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 4 life. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It seldom rains in Abzan lands. When it does, the khan marks the occasion by honoring the families of the fallen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Defender When Jeskai Barricade enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lightform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Lightform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.) Enchanted creature has flying and lifelink.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Lotus-Eye Mystics enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every action has a foreseen purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mardu Woe-Reaper or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who died in battle deserve their rest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you gain 1 life for each creature you control. {3}{W}: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Monk creature token with prowess.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By studying dragon anatomy, Jeskai monks have learned how to locate clusters of nerves that will incapacitate even the mightiest dragons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return each creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile those creatures at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rally the Ancestors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The family is a tree, and in times of need, every branch can be a weapon." - Daghatar the Adamant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Sage's Reverie enters the battlefield, draw a card for each Aura you control that's attached to a creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura you control that's attached to a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Shifting Wastes, more are killed by sand than by steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sandsteppe Outcast enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on Sandsteppe Outcast. • Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. {2}{UR}{UR}: The next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, put that card into your hand instead of into your graveyard as it resolves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.) • Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every choice alters the path of fate." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Wandering Champion deals combat damage to a player, if you control a blue or red permanent, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Learn from your enemies, but do not tolerate them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Wardscale Dragon is attacking, defending player can't cast spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dromoka's brood emerge from the dragon tempests covered with tough scales that protect them from most clan weapons and magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cloudform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Cloudform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.) Enchanted creature has flying and hexproof.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Study the topography of your enemies, and you will have a map to victory." - Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Each player draws X cards. • Each player mills X cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Frost Walker becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the clans carved out their territories, we saw allies where the Mardu saw only obstacles." - Yasova Dragonclaw

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jeskai Infiltrator can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures. When Jeskai Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has flying as long as you control a red or white permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Jeskai Sage dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The one who conquers the mind is greater than the one who conquers the world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The lotus takes root where body and mind intersect. It blooms when body and mind become one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marang River Prowler can't block and can't be blocked. You may cast Marang River Prowler from your graveyard as long as you control a black or green permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The currents of the Marang wash away both tracks and blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Mindscour Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, target player mills four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bells may one day ring as an anthem of our own end." - Kyu, Sage-Eye mystic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The quieter the skies, the calmer the mind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card. • Dragons - Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To defeat your enemies, you must remove their ability to make war against you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every failure, every death only makes my strength greater."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before you can open your third eye, you must prove you can open the first two."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts. {U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Return target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Sage-Eye Avengers attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if its power is less than Sage-Eye Avengers's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a card type. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker are card types.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show the enemy the true path, and the spirit will yearn to follow it." - Houn, Jeskai elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {RW}{RW}. If you do, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, mill two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skullkeeper is the first to arrive after the palace archers strike down intruders, probing their brains for choice bits of knowledge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You create a token that's a copy of that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ice can be shaped to any form, even the whisper of a memory." - Mytha, Temur shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Trespass.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few truly live in the moment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Torrent Elemental attacks, tap all creatures defending player controls. {3}{BG}{BG}: Put Torrent Elemental from exile onto the battlefield tapped. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maneuvers of the Abzan formation intrigued Ojutai in both their complexity and their futility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The charm of a naga is undeniable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dash {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boundaries drawn on maps or marked with stone have no meaning for the Mardu.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Ancestral Vengeance enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The defenses of the Abzan extend well beyond the walls of their fortresses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why would I kill you all? Who then would be left to worship me?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a red or white permanent, Battle Brawler gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every time he returns from battle unscathed, he feels a tinge of disappointment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {3}{RW}{RW}: Creatures your opponents control block this turn if able, and you choose how those creatures block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all Dragon creatures. • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards minus one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first khans of the Sultai relied on the magic of the rakshasa to ensure the survival of the clan.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. If you control a Warrior, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our emissaries are gifted negotiators." - Alesha, Who Smiles at Death

property.name: Rules
property.value: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mardu warrior was overjoyed when Tasigur set him free and granted him passage through the jungle. He failed to notice the Sultai leader's cruel smile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's a Dragon, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Tarkir, dragons emerge from enormous tempests, phenomena tied to Ugin's very presence on the plane.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. Mill three cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So long as death follows life, the supply lines of the Sultai will never be cut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hooded Assassin enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on Hooded Assassin. • Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mardu Shadowspear attacks, each opponent loses 1 life. Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mardu Strike Leader attacks, create a 2/1 black Warrior creature token. Dash {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Merciless Executioner enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He enjoys his work, for he sees only the worst Abzan criminals: those who betray their own kin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words have yet to halt an arrow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Dragons - At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature that's one or more colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it better to be a fool or a coward? Fools may get things done occasionally, but cowards live longer." - Ghelesh Shadowmane, rakshasa mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sibsig Host enters the battlefield, each player mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They were your friends, your family, your clan. They want only to welcome you." - Tasigur, the Golden Fang

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) When Sibsig Muckdraggers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) If a creature card with flying was exiled with Soulflayer's delve ability, Soulflayer has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, reach, trample, and vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has deathtouch as long as you control a green or blue permanent. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) {2}{GU}{GU}: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Each opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cruelest tortures leave no mark upon the flesh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Tasigur sent his ambassadors to the Abzan outpost, the true envoys were not the naga but the infectious rats they carried with them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {WB}{WB}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage this turn, it deals that much damage to each other creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you must die today, make your death worthy of legend." - Alesha, Who Smiles at Death

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scent of cooked flesh lingers in the charred landscape of Tarkir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodfire Enforcers has first strike and trample as long as an instant card and a sorcery card are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bloodfire practitioners train to focus their rage, building it deep inside themselves until they are ready to release it as a devastating attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Target creature with power 2 or less gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the Mardu were more in tune with their beasts, they would not scare so easily." - Jilaya, Temur whisperer

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Collateral Damage deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is much easier to create fire than to contain it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Defiant Ogre enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Ogre. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have no clan, but I still have purpose."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add {R} for each attacking creature you control. Until end of turn, attacking creatures you control gain "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dragons in the skies of Tarkir - for the first time, it feels like my home." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manifest the top card of your library, then put two +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anger can empower those who embrace it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Flamerush Rider attacks, create a token that's a copy of another target attacking creature and that's tapped and attacking. Exile the token at end of combat. Dash {2}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Flamewake Phoenix attacks each combat if able. Ferocious - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Flamewake Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature's controller reveals a card at random from their hand. Friendly Fire deals damage to that creature and that player equal to the revealed card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never tell goblins to ‘fire at will.'" - Urut Barzeel, Mardu hordechief

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Heelcutter attacks, target creature can't block this turn. Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Mardu are like the gore swine. We are wild, hunt in packs, and rarely clean the blood from our blades." - Vallash, Mardu warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were once Mardu, so your body and will are strong. Now we must train your mind." - Houn, Jeskai elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a green or blue permanent, you may cast Hungering Yeti as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No clan is as adept at saying "go away" as the Temur.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, Lightning Shrieker's owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragonslayers learned to keep silent about their deeds after seeing the terrible vengeance wrought by Kolaghan and her brood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has first strike as long as you control a white or black permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mardu all enjoy war, but only the goblins make a game of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn. • Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. • Dragons - Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, Outpost Siege deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take inspiration from your enemies, and make their strengths your own." - Alesha, Who Smiles at Death

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rageform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Rageform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.) Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Ferocious - {2}{GU}{GU}: Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Shockmaw Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons of the Kolaghan brood are always on the move. They are the driving force behind the Mardu's nomadic way of life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Smoldering Efreet dies, it deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The efreet are drawn to the Kaisham Wanderers, a loosely organized Jeskai school where trickery is employed to challenge the status quo and upend the belief systems of others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. Ferocious - That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vaultbreaker attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, damage can't be prevented this turn. Wild Slash deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Abzan Kin-Guard has lifelink as long as you control a white or black permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Mardu rush headlong toward extinction. We ensure the longevity of our clan by protecting our territory, not rampaging through it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ainok Guide enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on Ainok Guide. • Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Ambush Krotiq enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Abzan merchants soon discovered why this route was clear of dragons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Arashin War Beast deals combat damage to one or more blocking creatures, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We think of the naga as creeping cutthroats, slitherers in the swamps. But they are equally at home in the trees." - Goton, Qal Sisma shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Krushoks clear debris from fertile fields, fallow fields, and battlefields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bolster 3. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glittering scales in the Abzan vaults represent mighty deeds of the past and protection for generations to come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Destructor Dragon dies, destroy target noncreature permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After countless attacks on the Salt Road where it passes through the frozen tundra, the Abzan began to refer to the area as Atarka territory rather than Temur lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a stunning act of diplomacy, Yasova Dragonclaw ceded a portion of Temur lands to the Sultai. Her clan protested until they saw she had given the Sultai the breeding grounds of the krushoks. They hadn't realized she had a sense of humor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ferocious - Frontier Mastodon enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each bronze disk on its harness is an offering from a young Temur hunter, a sign of respect to the spirits of the wild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}. • Dragons - Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will be the ancestor my descendants call upon for aid. On that day I will take up my sword for my family once more."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons scorn the weak, even among their own kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dragons are feared for their breath and their bite, but it is their wings that make them unconquerable. Bring them to earth, and they die like any other beast." - Kassur, Sultai hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target nonattacking creature gains reach and deathtouch until end of turn. Untap it. • Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single battle affects countless others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Sandsteppe Mastodon enters the battlefield, bolster 5. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put five +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mastodon's path always leads to an oasis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control. Ferocious - You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mill four cards, then return a creature card and a land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no secret buried so deep that we will never find it." - Kurtar, Sultai necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has trample as long as you control a blue or red permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur see themselves as a pack, their bonds more primal than the Abzan's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Temur War Shaman enters the battlefield, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.) Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{WB}: Warden of the First Tree becomes a Human Warrior with base power and toughness 3/3. {2}{WB}{WB}: If Warden of the First Tree is a Warrior, it becomes a Human Spirit Warrior with trample and lifelink. {3}{WB}{WB}{WB}: If Warden of the First Tree is a Spirit, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. Ferocious - {T}: Add {G}{G}. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She speaks only in whispers but can be heard over the fiercest storm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.) Sacrifice Whisperwood Elemental: Until end of turn, face-up nontoken creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, manifest the top card of your library."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manifest the top card of your library, then put X +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A howl on the wind hides many dangers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}{UR}{UR}. If you do, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than Yasova Dragonclaw's power until end of turn, untap that creature, and it gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her hunger knows no limit. Left unchecked, she would feast on all of Tarkir." - Yasova Dragonclaw

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cunning Strike deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The opponent who blocks the path, becomes the path." - Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bane of countless shattered weapons, each a failure to slay her." - Daghatar the Adamant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manifest the top two cards of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The energies of the Temur lands are readily unleashed upon intruders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The invader hoped he could survive the beast's jaws and emerge through its rotting skin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Harsh Sustenance deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Shifting Wastes provide refuge to those who know where to look for it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Dash {3}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I battled Ojutai, I realized my learning had only begun." - Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, hexproof Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No machinations, no puppet strings, no plots. Just pure, sweeping death." - Tasigur, the Golden Fang

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No sun or fire can warm my blood quite like a war flare." - Urut Barzeel, Mardu hordechief

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Goblin Boom Keg. When Goblin Boom Keg is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragonfire spawned many imitations. Some were more dramatic than others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+2. Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Hero's Blade to it. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best swords are forged with dragonfire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their origins are shrouded in mystery. I believe they are the protectors of the lost secrets of our world." - Jilaya, Temur whisperer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most skilled Jeskai artisans can craft imposing golems with such precision that they will last an eternity - the time believed necessary to master the Fires of the Jeskai Way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a lore counter on Scroll of the Masters. {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each lore counter on Scroll of the Masters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ugin's Construct enters the battlefield, sacrifice a permanent that's one or more colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While trapping the Eldrazi on Zendikar, Ugin learned little from Sorin, but he gleaned the rudiments of lithomancy from Nahiri.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped. When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped. When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Crucible of the Spirit Dragon. {T}, Remove X storage counters from Crucible of the Spirit Dragon: Add X mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or activate abilities of Dragons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped. When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped. When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped. When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped. When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped. When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped. When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.
